publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7014 Richard Baker: Solicitor of the Year—That the Parliament congratulates Frank Maguire of Thompsons Solicitors on being named Solicitor of the Year at the Law Awards of Scotland 2010; recognises that he has received the award in light of his legal expertise and political commitment; notes that he has worked with members of Parliament from across all parties particularly to improve and protect the rights of workers with asbestos-related disease, and congratulates all the winners at this year’s awards and the organisers on the success of the event. Supported by: Des McNulty*, James Kelly*, Duncan McNeil*, Karen Gillon*, Bill Butler*, Bill Kidd*, Jackie Baillie*

S3M-7014 Solicitor of the Year (lodged on 17 September 2010) Marlyn Glen*, Dr Richard Simpson*, John Park*, Mary Mulligan*, Claire Baker*, David Whitton*, Michael McMahon*, Patricia Ferguson*, George Foulkes*, Margaret Curran*, Stuart McMillan*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-7014 Solicitor of the Year (lodged on 17 September 2010) Ken Macintosh*, Cathie Craigie*, Rhona Brankin*
S3M-7014 Solicitor of the Year (lodged on 17 September 2010) Bill Wilson*, Hugh Henry*
